name: Specification Quality Evaluation
description: Criteria for evaluating the quality and completeness of a specification

clarity.description: How clear and understandable is the specification?

checks.name: Problem statement is clear
checks.question: Is the problem being solved clearly stated in 1-3 sentences?

checks.name: No ambiguous terms
checks.question: Are all terms clearly defined or commonly understood?

checks.name: Examples provided
checks.question: Are concrete examples provided for complex concepts?

checks.name: Diagrams included
checks.question: Are diagrams or visual aids used where helpful?

checks.name: Scope is clear
checks.question: Is it obvious what's in scope and out of scope?

completeness.description: Does the spec contain all necessary information?

checks.name: Requirements documented
checks.question: Are all functional and non-functional requirements listed?

checks.name: Acceptance criteria defined
checks.question: Does each requirement have testable acceptance criteria?

checks.name: Technical design specified
checks.question: Is the technical approach documented with sufficient detail?

checks.name: Edge cases considered
checks.question: Are edge cases and error scenarios addressed?

checks.name: Dependencies identified
checks.question: Are all dependencies (internal, external, blocking) listed?

technical_detail.description: Is the technical design sufficiently detailed?

checks.name: Architecture documented
checks.question: Is the high-level architecture described with diagrams?

checks.name: Interfaces specified
checks.question: Are APIs, functions, or interfaces fully defined?

checks.name: Data models defined
checks.question: Are data structures and schemas specified?

checks.name: Error handling addressed
checks.question: Is error handling strategy documented?

checks.name: Performance considerations
checks.question: Are performance requirements and constraints addressed?

testability.description: Can the spec be validated through testing?

checks.name: Acceptance criteria are testable
checks.question: Can acceptance criteria be verified objectively?

checks.name: Test strategy defined
checks.question: Is the testing approach (unit, integration, e2e) specified?

checks.name: Success metrics quantified
checks.question: Are success metrics measurable and specific?

checks.name: Authentication specified
checks.question: If applicable, is authentication approach documented?

checks.name: Authorization defined
checks.question: If applicable, are authorization rules specified?

checks.name: Input validation
checks.question: Is input validation strategy documented?

checks.name: Data protection
checks.question: Are sensitive data handling requirements specified?

checks.name: Deployment plan
checks.question: Is the deployment approach specified?

checks.name: Monitoring strategy
checks.question: Are monitoring and alerting requirements defined?

checks.name: Rollback plan
checks.question: Is there a rollback or recovery plan?

checks.name: Performance targets
checks.question: Are performance targets and SLOs specified?

excellent.label: Excellent
excellent.description: Specification is comprehensive, clear, and ready for implementation

good.label: Good
good.description: Specification is solid with minor gaps that should be addressed

fair.label: Fair
fair.description: Specification needs work in several areas before implementation

poor.label: Poor
poor.description: Specification has significant gaps and needs major revision

below_60: Review the spec template and ensure all sections are completed
Add concrete examples for complex concepts
Define testable acceptance criteria for all requirements
Document technical design with architecture diagrams
Consider security, performance, and operational requirements
60_to_74: Fill in remaining gaps in requirements and design
Add more technical detail for complex components
Ensure all edge cases are considered
Get stakeholder feedback on unclear areas
75_to_89: Add more concrete examples if helpful
Verify all acceptance criteria are testable
Consider adding decision records for key choices
90_plus: Share with team for final review
